description: Replace n by concatenation of its odd divisors.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: dtn[ L_ ] := Fold[ 10#1+#2&, 0, L ] Array[ dtn[ Flatten[ Map[ IntegerDigits, Select[ Divisors[ # ], OddQ ] ] ] ]&, 50 ]cod[n_]:=FromDigits[Flatten[IntegerDigits/@Select[Divisors[n],OddQ]]]; Array[cod,60] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 24 2014 *)
prog: (Haskell)a037283 = read . concat . (map show) . a182469_row :: Integer -> Integer-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 01 2012]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
